text: {| |} The Airsport Sonata is a Czech ultralight motor glider with retractable propeller, designed and produced by Airsport of Zbraslavice. ==Design and development== The aircraft features a cantilever low-wing, a T-tail, a two- seats-in-side-by-side configuration enclosed cockpit, electric flaps, a retractable landing gear, and a single engine in tractor configuration. The Sonata is made from composites. Its polyhedral wing is . Standard engines available are the Rotax 582 two-stroke and the Hirth F34 powerplant. ==Specifications== ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000s Czech ultralight aircraft Category:Single-engined tractor aircraft Category:Airsport aircraft
title: Airsport Sonata
